Text: Re The Honorable Norman Mineta Letter Cc Joe On behalf of the CMS Energy Companies we appreciate the leadership you have exhibited in taking on this most important task Without your persistence and insight Im sure we could not have come together so effectively to speak with one industry voice Congratulations to all Chris Monroe Joe joe To Joe Monroe Email John Somerhalder nocalcom Email Fred Fowler Email George M Rootes Email Tom Miesner Email PM Stan Horton Email Cuba Wadlington Email Cuba illiamscom David Lemmon Email Dick Reiten Email Dick Rabinow Email Chris Helms Email Phil Ackerman Email ATFUELCOM William Thacker Email Jeet Bindra Email Tony Botterweck Email ochindcom Dave Parker Email Jerry Halvorsen Email Red Cavaney Email Bob Cave Email Ben Cooper Email cc Marty Matheson Email Gay Friedmann Email Kyle Rogers Email Bert Kalisch Email Doug Freberg Email Subject The Honorable Norman Mineta Letter All Today marks a tremendous milestone in that the letter that confirms the Pipeline Industry has joined together to address regulatory and legislative pipeline safety issues in a unified fashion has been delivered to the Secretary of Transportation Norman Mineta via courier These documents were also sent to select Senators Congressmen and Staff You as signatory to this letter acting as CEOs Chairman of Boards Executive Committees of Associations CEOs Presidents of the Associations and Institutes and Industry Leaders confirm the path forward for the entire industry and collectively we represent the entire industry We need to roll out this confirmation to all the industry stakeholders and encourage the use of these documents to advance our efforts A followup facetoface session with Secretary Mineta and a few of the CEOs will be worked into his busy schedule as soon as possible A copy of the signed document went out in the mail to you today and a electronic copy without the signatures is attached for your convenience Also attached is the OnePager that accompanied the letter and a Industry news release Congratulations to all who made this possible To you and yoursHappy Thanksgiving Joint CEO Mineta letterFinal Sentdoc
